server - Variable in class server.net.Server
Holds the socket used to listen for incoming connections.
Server - Class in server.net
This class holds the server socket and handles all connections from clients by creating a threaded client handler object called "Connection", also keeps track of all connections in a list.
Server(int) - Constructor for class server.net.Server
Creates a server socket bound to a specified port and a list of connected players, then starts listener thread.
server.game - package server.game
Provides the classes necessary to manage games and their game states.
server.net - package server.net
Provides the classes necessary to create a server for communication to multiple clients using sockets.
